guide.title: Bugs for 2004.0
guide.abstract: This is a TODO-List based on all bugs that were encountered in the testing phase for 2004.0 and after the release. See also the release notes for 2004.0

ul.li: the do*-Boot-parameters need to be fixed. This has to be done in Genkernel
Instead of merging 3rd-Party-modules onto the fs of the CD, they should be moved into the initrd.
catalyst needs to set a timezone before compiling kernels - otherwise uname -v won't work
communication between releng and doc : My suggestion would be (well, that's what I will do ;) ) to send quick reports to Swift to guarantee that handbook and release fit together.
mdadm needs to be put onto the livecd
3com-574 NICs should be supported by the kernels on the CD
